game.name: Kindred [High Tide]
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In this detective horror visual novel, investigate a seabound anomaly. Explore areas of interest, uncover clues, and piece together evidence before time runs out — and before this mission becomes your last. Choose a side; don't look back.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this detective horror visual novel, investigate a seabound anomaly. Explore areas of interest, uncover clues, and piece together evidence before time runs out — and before this mission becomes your last. Choose a side; don't look back.
